code: export var ADD_TODO="ADD_TODO";export var TOGGLE_TODO="TOGGLE_TODO";export var DELETE_TODO="DELETE_TODO";export var CLEAR_COMPLETED_TODOS="CLEAR_COMPLETED_TODOS";export var addTodo=function addTodo(todoTitle){var newTodo={userId:1,id:Math.round(Math.random()*10000000),title:todoTitle,completed:false};return{type:ADD_TODO,payload:newTodo};};export var toggleTodo=function toggleTodo(todoIdToToggle){return{type:TOGGLE_TODO,payload:todoIdToToggle};};export var deleteTodo=function deleteTodo(todoToDelete){return{type:DELETE_TODO,payload:todoToDelete};};export var clearCompletedTodos=function clearCompletedTodos(){return{type:CLEAR_COMPLETED_TODOS};};
